comments.raw_text: CompartmentChecker does this weird thing where if cx->compartment is NULL then it only checks that the compartments of the various things are all consistent with each other.  Most of the API functions thus tolerate being passed a cx with a NULL compartment.  There are places in the browser that have such behavior, which looks broken to me.
comments.creator: bhackett1024@gmail.com
